metadata.title: PRE 25 04

config.question: Which of the following instituted the prohibition era in the United States?

answer_3.response: In December 1917, Congress passed the Eighteenth Amendment, prohibiting the manufacture and sale of alcoholic beverages, and then sent the amendment to the states for ratification. In January 1919, Nebraska became the necessary thirty-sixth state to ratify it, and prohibition became the law of the land.

In January 1919, Nebraska became the necessary thirty-sixth state to ratify it, and prohibition became the law of the land.
